refsection.title: Description
refsection.para: This function is used to create mex libraries and to generate a loader file which can be used to dynamically load the mex shared library.
Note that the file name containing the mex code can be set in the third input argument (files) or the second value of the table input argument.

para.emphasis: Note that a compiler must be available on the system to use this function.
